prompts: Create a majestic ice-type Pokemon with graceful wings and a frosty crown.
Show me a legendary bird Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter and storms.
Imagine a Pokemon designed with a sleek, icy blue body and shimmering feathers.
Generate an elegant, flying-type creature with an ice theme and captivating features.
Make a legendary creature that rules the skies with its powerful ice abilities.
Design a mythical Pokemon with a serene demeanor and a vibrant blue color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that represents the beauty and chill of a snowy landscape.
